printed_text: +2[mu] Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may reduce your maximum hand size by 1 until the beginning of your next turn. If you do, the strength of that ice is lowered to 0 for the remainder of the encounter. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +2 mu Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may reduce your maximum hand size by 1 until the beginning of your next turn. If you do, the strength of that ice is lowered to 0 for the remainder of the encounter. Limit 1 console per player.

printed_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each power counter on it. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each power counter on it. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 sentry subroutine.

printed_text: X[credit],[trash]: Prevent X damage from a card currently being accessed.
stripped_printed_text: X credits,trash: Prevent X damage from a card currently being accessed.

printed_text:
Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] for every 5[credit] in the Corp's credit pool.
Trash Tapwrm if the Corp purges virus counters.
stripped_printed_text: Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. When your turn begins, gain 1 credit for every 5 credits in the Corp's credit pool. Trash Tapwrm if the Corp purges virus counters.

flavor: "Everything leaves a ripple in cyberspace. If you can find the ripples, nothing can hide." -Khan
printed_text: When your turn begins, choose a server. [click], 2[credit]: Run the server you chose this turn. The first time a subroutine would resolve during this run, prevent it from resolving.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, choose a server. click, 2 credits: Run the server you chose this turn. The first time a subroutine would resolve during this run, prevent it from resolving.

flavor: "You want to do business in Los Pistoleros turf, then you gotta deal with me."
printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, place 2 power counters on Aaron Marrón. Hosted power counter: Remove 1 tag and draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, place 2 power counters on Aaron Marron. Hosted power counter: Remove 1 tag and draw 1 card.

printed_text:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Take an additional turn after this one. Remove Encore from the game instead of trashing it.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Take an additional turn after this one. Remove Encore from the game instead of trashing it.

flavor: Faster than the eye can follow.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. X[credit]: +X strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. X credits: +X strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.

printed_text:
Play only as your first [click] and only if the Corp scored no agendas during his or her last turn.
Gain 10[credit]. The Corp gains 5[credit]. You cannot initiate any runs this turn.
stripped_printed_text: Play only as your first click and only if the Corp scored no agendas during his or her last turn. Gain 10 credits. The Corp gains 5 credits. You cannot initiate any runs this turn.

printed_text: Place 1 agenda counter on Sensor Net Activation when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Rez a bioroid, ignoring all costs. When the turn ends, derez that bioroid.
stripped_printed_text: Place 1 agenda counter on Sensor Net Activation when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Rez a bioroid, ignoring all costs. When the turn ends, derez that bioroid.

flavor: It required a hexadecimal code along with biometrics, delivered by way of BMI.
printed_text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Gain 8[credit] and draw 4 cards.
stripped_printed_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Gain 8 credits and draw 4 cards.

flavor: "Ice is not meant to kill; just slow or cripple the Runner. Killing is my job." - Tori Hanzō
printed_text: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Chiyashi while there is an AI installed, trash the top 2 cards of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Chiyashi while there is an AI installed, trash the top 2 cards of the Runner's stack. Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine End the run.

printed_text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are agendas, assets, or upgrades, you may install 1 of those cards in a remote server.
stripped_printed_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are agendas, assets, or upgrades, you may install 1 of those cards in a remote server.

printed_text:
The Runner's base link strength is reduced to 0 during the first trace each turn.
Whenever the Runner increases his or her link strength by spending credits, gain 1[credit] for every 2[credit] spent.
stripped_printed_text: The Runner's base link strength is reduced to 0 during the first trace each turn. Whenever the Runner increases his or her link strength by spending credits, gain 1 credit for every 2 credits spent.

printed_text:
If Herald is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Herald, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Herald from Archives.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] The Corp may pay up to 2[credit] to place that number of advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.
stripped_printed_text: If Herald is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Herald, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Herald from Archives. Subroutine The Corp gains 2 credits. Subroutine The Corp may pay up to 2 credits to place that number of advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.

printed_text:
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine The Corp gains 2 credits. Subroutine The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Trace 2 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: "My job? I provide legal exculpation and sign everything. It pays very well."
printed_text: While the Runner has fewer than 6[credit], Bryan Stinson gains "[click]: Play a transaction operation from Archives, ignoring all costs. Remove that transaction from the game instead of trashing it."
stripped_printed_text: While the Runner has fewer than 6 credits, Bryan Stinson gains "click: Play a transaction operation from Archives, ignoring all costs. Remove that transaction from the game instead of trashing it."

printed_text:
Gain 1[credit] when your turn begins.
Whenever you gain credits through a card ability other than from NASX, you may spend up to 2[credit] to place that many power counters on NASX.
[click],[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each power counter on NASX.
stripped_printed_text: Gain 1 credit when your turn begins. Whenever you gain credits through a card ability other than from NASX, you may spend up to 2 credits to place that many power counters on NASX. click,trash: Gain 2 credits for each power counter on NASX.

flavor: One way to get rid of a virus is to get a nastier virus.
printed_text: [subroutine] Trace 4 If successful, purge virus counters. [subroutine] Trace 3 If successful, trash 1 virus. [subroutine] Trace 2 If successful, remove a virus in the heap from the game. [subroutine] Trace 1 If successful, end the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trace 4 If successful, purge virus counters. Subroutine Trace 3 If successful, trash 1 virus. Subroutine Trace 2 If successful, remove a virus in the heap from the game. Subroutine Trace 1 If successful, end the run.

[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards.
